channel.title: Articles on crashdot.com
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on crashdot.com

item.title: No more Windows. FreeBSD instead.
item.description: No, I did not stop running OpenSUSE Tumbleweed.

item.title: New site
item.description: After building and setting up my new computer and subsequent move away from the Apple Mac ecosystem, I was left with an issue that the site I had built was setup using a Mac-only tool and could not be migrated to Windows.
